alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 9:28PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .Heavy rainfall during the past 24 hours will cause minor flooding on Horse Creek near Arcadia. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Horse Creek near Arcadia at SR 72. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Buildings in Hidden Acres flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 13.5 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.5 feet on 08/27/1953. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Horse Creek Arcadia at SR 7 12.0 9.1 Wed 8 pm 12.4 13.3 13.4 12.9 12.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by noon Thursday.Thursday afternoon at 1230 PM EDT.
